tips.console.1: Use a hoe to prepare areas of ground for planting.
tips.console.2: Feed a bone to a wolf to tame it. You can then make it sit or follow you.
tips.console.3: Use the right tool for the job!
tips.console.4: A single bucket of lava can be used in a furnace to smelt 100 blocks.
tips.console.5: Lava can take minutes to disappear COMPLETELY when the source block is removed.
tips.console.6: Placing two chests side by side will make one large chest.
tips.console.7: You can change your game spawn point and skip to dawn by sleeping in a bed.
tips.console.8: Stackable fences are in the game now!
tips.console.10: Harvest leather from cows, and use it to make armor.
tips.console.11: Did you know there's a Minecraft Wiki?
tips.console.12: Plant some saplings and they'll grow into trees.
tips.console.13: Blocks that can be used as a light source will melt snow and ice. This includes torches, glowstone, and Jack-O-Lanterns.
tips.console.14: Chickens lay an egg every 5 to 10 minutes.
tips.console.16: Obsidian can only be mined with a diamond pickaxe.
tips.console.17: Obsidian is created when water hits a lava source block.
tips.console.18: Creepers are the easiest obtainable source of gunpowder.
tips.console.19: Don't look an Enderman in the eye!
tips.console.20: Do not look directly at the bugs.
tips.console.21: The instrument played by a note block depends on the material beneath it.
tips.console.23: If you set the game difficulty to Peaceful, your health will automatically regenerate, and no monsters will come out at night!
tips.console.24: Always assume rumors are false, rather than assuming they're true!
tips.console.25: Eating cooked pork chops gives more health than eating raw pork chops.
tips.console.26: No-one at Mojang has ever seen junkboy's face.
tips.console.27: There will be an update to this game eventually!
tips.console.29: Mojang has more awards than staff!
tips.console.31: Building a portal will allow you to travel to another dimension - The Nether.
tips.console.32: Read the What's New section in the How to Play menus to see the latest update information about the game.
tips.console.33: Cook cactus in a furnace to get green dye.
tips.console.34: Cobblestone is resistant to Ghast fireballs, making it useful for guarding portals.
tips.console.36: Notch has over a million followers on twitter!
tips.console.37: Creepers explode when they get close to you!
tips.console.38: Digging soil or sand with a spade is faster than with your hand!
tips.console.39: Take caution when building structures made of wool in open air, as lightning from thunderstorms can set wool on fire.
tips.console.40: If you can't find any coal for your torches, you can always make charcoal from trees in a furnace.
tips.console.41: Bonemeal (crafted from a Skeleton bone) can be used as a fertilizer, and can make things grow instantly!
tips.console.42: Sleeping in a bed at night will fast forward the game to dawn, but all players in a multiplayer game need to sleep in beds at the same time.
tips.console.43: Some animals will follow you if you have wheat in your hand.
tips.console.45: Spiders won't attack you during the day - unless you attack them.
tips.console.46: Make some torches to light up areas at night. Monsters will avoid the areas around these torches.
tips.console.47: If an animal can't move more than 20 blocks in any direction, it won't despawn.
tips.console.48: Digging straight down or straight up is not a great idea.
tips.console.49: Creepers were born from a coding bug.
tips.console.50: Tame wolves show their health with the position of their tail. Feed them meat to heal them.
tips.console.51: Hit those fireballs back at the Ghast!
tips.console.52: Not all Swedish people have blonde hair. Some, like Jens from Mojang, even have ginger hair!
tips.console.53: If you have an empty bucket, you can fill it with milk from a cow, or water, or lava!
tips.console.54: Is it a chicken or is it a duck?
tips.console.55: Zombies and Skeletons can survive daylight if they are in water.
tips.console.56: Attacking a wolf will cause any wolves in the immediate vicinity to turn hostile and attack you. This trait is also shared by Zombie Pigmen.
tips.console.57: Pigmen won't attack you, unless you attack them.
tips.console.58: Harvest pork chops from pigs, and cook them and eat them to regain health.
tips.console.59: Get to destinations faster with a minecart and rail!
tips.console.minecon.2: No-one can remember where Minecon 2014 was held.
tips.console.minecon.3: Minecon 2011 was in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA!
tips.console.minecon.5: Minecon 2013 was in Orlando, Florida, USA!
tips.console.minecon.7: Minecon 2016 was in Anaheim, California, USA!
tips.console.java.1: Minecraft: Java Edition broke lots of records!
tips.console.java.2: We think Mojang has removed Herobrine from the Java Edition game, but we're not too sure.
tips.console.java.3: minecraftforum has a section dedicated to the Java Edition.
tips.console.java.4: You'll get the latest info on this game from Minecraft on twitter!
tips.console.java.5: Alter the brightness settings to make the game brighter or darker.
